steps.name: The user is on the Wiggle main page
The user navigates to the "Run" category page

elements.name: Verify product count for New Balance remains consistent after applying Adidas filter with specific price range

steps.name: The user applies a price filter for range "£250 to £500"
The user observes the initial product count for brand "New Balance"

result.error_message:

steps.name: The product count for brand "New Balance" should remain visible and be the same as the initial count

name: Brand Filter Interaction and Product Count Consistency on Run Page
description:
As a user of Wiggle
  I want to apply price and brand filters on the "Run" category page
  I expect the product count display for other unaffected brands to remain consistent or update correctly
